protocol.name: P-GSE39090-1
protocol.text: ID_REF =  VALUE = RMA normalized log2 signal intensity

protocol.name: P-GSE39090-2
protocol.text: Fourteen-day-old wild type and rcf1-1 mutant plants were subjuected to cold stress at 4°C for 0, 12, and 24 h.

protocol.name: P-GSE39090-3
protocol.text: Arabidopsis seedlings on Murashige and Skoog (MS) medium agar plates (1x MS salts, 2% sucrose, 0.6% agar, pH 5.7) were grown under cool, white light (~120 μmol m-2 s-1) at 21 ± 1℃ with a 16-h-light/8-h-dark photoperiod.

protocol.name: P-GSE39090-4
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted with Trizol reagent (Invitrogen) following the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE39090-5
protocol.text: Biotinylated cRNA were prepared according to the standard Affymetrix protocol from 6 µg total RNA (Expression Analysis Technical Manual, 2001, Affymetrix).

protocol.name: P-GSE39090-6
protocol.text: Following fragmentation, 10 µg of cRNA was hybridized for 16 h at 45°C on Affymetrix ATH1 GeneChips. GeneChips were washed and stained in the Affymetrix Fluidics Station 400.

protocol.name: P-GSE39090-7
protocol.text: GeneChips were scanned using the Hewlett-Packard GeneArray Scanner G2500A.

protocol.name: P-GSE39090-8
protocol.text: The datasets were subjected to the Robust Multiarray Averaging (RMA) normalization method. The normalized data were further analyzed and p-values were generated by the affymGUI component of Bioconductor in statistics environment R with the default parameters.Genes were selected by the RankProd (non-paramteric method based on the estimated percentage of false discoveries (p value < 0.05)) method. Normalized expression values presented in Matrix table are log2 values.
